posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.Quick StartCreate a new post$ hexo new "My New Post"More info: WritingRun server$ hexo serverMore info: ServerGenerate static files$ hexo generateMore info: GeneratingDeploy to remote sites$ hexo deployMore info: Deployment
